CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 29, 1962, pg. 5, reads: "Giant 'Erector Set' - This giant crane, slung high in air at the construction site of the Washington Plaza Towers, shouted 'Merry Christmas' to passersby Monday afternoon. Aglow with lights in the shape of a Christmas tree near its peak, the crane and its neighbor at left reminded one of a boy's giant erector set, placed in the middle of a toy city. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Two cranes at construction site of Washington Plaza Towers, with Civic Arena and Downtown in background, and cars parked in street in foreground
